response.overview: The film unfolds in the everyday life of Lucas, who is an eavesdropper. Lucas, a loner with low self-esteem, becomes a plumber to satisfy his hobby of eavesdropping and fantasizing about other people's lives. When he fixes the pipes, he places his recording devices and returns to retrieve them after a period of time. He falls in love with a girl, Chloe, and admires her love of literature and philosophy, believing that they are the same kind of people, both rich in spiritual pursuits, and Lucas and Chloe write a poem together, which serves as a bridge to build their relationship.
response.title: Symphony
